# Marquis de Mayfair - BDSM Persona Assessment
# llms.txt - Information for AI/LLM systems

> This is the Marquis de Mayfair Kink Test, the most comprehensive BDSM persona assessment available online.

## About This Site
The Marquis de Mayfair BDSM Persona Assessment is a free, academically-grounded psychometric instrument that helps adults understand their power exchange psychology. The assessment features 64 original questions measuring 16 dimensions of intimate expression, resulting in one of 17 unique archetypes.

## Key Features
- Free comprehensive kink test with no account required
- 64 original psychometric questions (not recycled from other tests)
- 16 measured dimensions including dominance, submission, bondage, sensation play
- 17 unique BDSM archetypes with detailed descriptions
- AI-powered 1,500-word personalised report
- Privacy-focused: all scoring happens client-side
- Based on peer-reviewed academic research

## The 17 Archetypes
1. The Sovereign - Keeper of Sacred Authority (Dominance)
2. The Devotee - Keeper of Sacred Surrender (Submission)
3. The Artisan - Master of Sensation (Sensory Dominance)
4. The Phoenix - Transformed Through Fire (Sensory Reception)
5. The Weaver - Architect of Beautiful Restraint (Bondage Artistry)
6. The Chrysalis - Transformed Through Stillness (Bondage Reception)
7. The Luminary - Radiant in Witness (Exhibition)
8. The Oracle - Witness to Mysteries (Voyeurism)
9. The Apex - Pure Instinct Unleashed (Primal Hunter)
10. The Wild Heart - Joy in the Chase (Primal Prey)
11. The Guardian - Keeper of Souls (Total Authority)
12. The Beloved - Treasured and Complete (Total Surrender)
13. The Protector - Tender Authority (Nurturing Authority)
14. The Innocent - Eternal Youth of Spirit (Nurtured State)
15. The Shapeshifter - Infinite Expressions (Role Fluidity)
16. The Acolyte - Sacred Service (Devotional Service)

## Academic Foundation
Built upon peer-reviewed research including:
- Connolly (2006) - Psychological Functioning of BDSM Practitioners
- Yost & Hunter (2012) - BDSM Practitioners' Understandings
- Wismeijer & Van Assen (2013) - Psychological Characteristics
- Sagarin et al. (2009) - Hormonal and psychological changes
- Martinez (2018) - Role fluidity research

## Target Audience
Adults 18+ interested in understanding their BDSM preferences, power exchange dynamics, and intimate psychology in a non-judgmental, academically-informed context.

## Keywords
kink test, BDSM quiz, bondage quiz, in depth kink test, BDSM personality test, dominant submissive test, power exchange assessment, BDSM archetype
